item.title: LastPass
item.description: I use a fair number of password managers for various reasons. However something that bugs me with their prompts is they don’t have a button that easily allows me to configure an exemption.. I almost never want to remember a password used on “localhost” on some weird port number because I develop software and test it frequently: But yet it prompts me every time. There is a way I can manually configure this, Never Urls:
